protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the conversion of hemimercaptal, formed from methylglyoxal and glutathione, to S-lactoylglutathione. Involved in the regulation of TNF-induced transcriptional activity of NF-kappa-B.

go_class.description: regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter
